page.title: 09Attitudes in Priors Marston
page.content: {Village.}Friendly & caring community, offering many sporting & recreational facilities often involving the whole family. {Transport.}The limited bus service restricts people who have no car wishing to visit facilities outside the village such as swimming pools, large supermarkets and other shops. {Housing.}Cheaper housing but built in character is needed to encourage families with young children to settle in the village thus establishing continuity of the villege school and bringing new blood to the clubs & organisations run in the village. {Employment.}Many would like a cottage industry or craft centre set up in the village offering local employment to youngsters as most people commute to work.
